How We Help You Become Debt-Free

Speak With a Financial Expert

Start with a one-on-one conversation with our financial expert. We understand your loans, EMIs, and current situation to check whether loan settlement is the right solution for you.

Personalised Financial Assessment

We carefully evaluate your income, outstanding debts, and repayment capacity. Based on this assessment, we design a settlement strategy tailored specifically to your financial needs.

Enroll in the Settlement Program

Once you‚Äôre comfortable with the plan, you enroll in our loan settlement program. All fees, timelines, and the negotiation process are clearly explained upfront ‚Äî no surprises.

Build Your Settlement Savings

You begin setting aside funds in a dedicated account. These savings are used exclusively for settlements, helping you stay prepared while reducing financial stress.

Negotiation With Creditors

Our experienced legal and financial team negotiates directly with your lenders. The goal is to reduce your total outstanding amount and reach a mutually agreed settlement.

Achieve a Debt-Free Life

Once the settlement is completed, you receive official confirmation from the lender. Your loan is closed, stress is lifted, and you move forward with a fresh financial start.

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Clear answers to common concerns about loan resolution and support

Which types of loans does Resolve Now assist with?

We provide assistance for various kinds of loans, including personal loans, credit card dues, business loans, and other unsecured borrowings, depending on individual circumstances.

How long does the loan resolution process usually take?

The timeline varies based on the lender, loan amount, and case complexity, but most resolutions are achieved within a few weeks to a few months.

Will interest or penalty charges continue during the settlement process?

In many cases, we work to minimize additional interest and late fees by engaging with lenders and negotiating fair terms on your behalf.

How should I respond to calls from banks or recovery agents?

Once you are connected with us, we guide you on handling communication professionally and, where possible, act as an intermediary to reduce unnecessary pressure.

What if a lender initiates legal proceedings against me?

If legal action is initiated, our team helps you understand the situation and connects you with appropriate legal guidance to ensure your rights are protected.
